name: Sky Seeker
description:
"Sky Seeker" is a game that aims to drop the enemy at the target location.

It's easy to play and you can win by hitting an enemy and pushing it out of the field.
Players will lose if they fall outside like the enemy.
Therefore, avoid it so that it will not hit the enemy's attack, or stay inside the field so that it will not fall outside.
The enemy has stamina and can be reduced by attacking.
The less this stamina, the larger the pushing distance.
And the protagonist can charge the attack, and the more he does, the bigger the enemy can be pushed out.
If you can blow away the enemy by hitting the maximum charge attack with the enemy's stamina reduced, you can feel very exhilarating so please try playing.
